recommended_degree: Manajemen Pendidikan, Teknologi Pendidikan, Administrasi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
* Assist in the development and enhancement of learning materials, modules, and academic resources.
* Support the coordination of training programs, workshops, and internal learning activities.
* Help collect, organize, and analyze data related to learning outcomes, student development, and program effectiveness.
* Maintain and update CLE documentation, records, and digital learning platforms.
* Assist in preparing presentations, reports, and summaries for meetings or academic reviews.
* Coordinate with lecturers, departments, and students to ensure smooth execution of learning initiatives.
* Support quality assurance activities related to teaching and learning processes.
* Help monitor class observations, feedback collection, and continuous improvement actions.
* Contribute ideas and participate in projects aimed at improving teaching quality and student learning experiences.
* Perform administrative tasks and other duties assigned by the CLE team.
